segments.text: Jack I hear you have a chance to go to college without taking a test . Is that right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The news goes so fast . Ah , yes , I haven't decided yet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't hesitate . That's a very famous university which a lot of students are longing to attain .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe you are right . But the major is not fit for me . I like architecture more than computers .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But this chance is really precious .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I know . So I am thinking now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hope you can make a clever choice . Anyway , the opportunities around you are not that By .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you for your kindness . I will think about it carefully .
segments.speaker: S2
